framework:entity-query.name: mapSaleContractTemplateList
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select contract from ContractTemplate contract where contract.type = 'MAP_SALE_NEW_HOUSE' and contract.projectCode = '#{logonInfo.groupCode}'

framework:entity-query.name: saleNewContractTemplateList
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select contract from ContractTemplate contract where contract.type = 'SALE_NEW_HOUSE' and contract.projectCode = '#{logonInfo.groupCode}'
